# Swift 第三方库（个人精选）

## 网络
1. [Just](https://github.com/JustHTTP/Just)
2. [Reachability.swift](https://github.com/ashleymills/Reachability.swift)

### 图片
1. [Kingfisher](https://github.com/onevcat/Kingfisher)

## JSON
1. [SwiftyJSON](https://github.com/SwiftyJSON/SwiftyJSON)
2. [HandyJSON](https://github.com/alibaba/HandyJSON)

## 数据库
1. [Realm](https://github.com/realm/realm-cocoa)
2. [YTKKeyValueStore_Swift](https://github.com/sgxiang/YTKKeyValueStore_Swift)

## 本地化(多语言)
1. [Localize-Swift](https://github.com/marmelroy/Localize-Swift)

## 自动布局(AutoLayout)
1. [SnapKit](https://github.com/SnapKit/SnapKit)


# 第三方Swift资源总结

1. [awesome-swift](https://github.com/matteocrippa/awesome-swift) ( [APP下载](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/awesome-for-swift-cheatsheet/id1078115427) )
2. [TimLiu-iOS/Swift](https://github.com/Tim9Liu9/TimLiu-iOS/blob/master/Swift.md)
